reviewText:
Get this DVD AND this one too and when you get done with BOTH DVDs you will NEVER look at Christmas(or the Holy Bible) the same whay again!:
http://www.amazon.com/Christmas-Star-Freedom-Films-Video/product-reviews/B001KKSXVW/ref=dp_top_cm_cr_acr_txt?ie=UTF8&showViewpoints=1

This is an excellent historical and biblical summary of Christ's birth, His blood lineage and legal lineage from King David as God promised.  It explains the Magi (wise men) and who they really were.  It links the real time line of the birth of Christ and our traditional Christmas combined with pagan holidays. Dr Missler brings out the childhood and growning up of Jesus, especially in Psalm 69, the ridicule, misery and hardships He endured as an illegimate child as seen at that time by many.  I must see it again, there is too much to absorb the first time around.  A great Bible lesson about Jesus Christ,our Saviour.
loved it
great read !!
As with all of Chuck Missler's material. It is informative, well researched and worthwhile.  A good addition to any Christian library.
cool
Quick reaad, that gives historical background and context to the Christmas story.
Very good read. Very informative. The one criticism is that it was too short. There are other aspects of Christmas with which Church did not deal.

Every Biblical scholar needs this, and if you are not a Biblical scholar you should become one.  This DVD will certainly assist one in pursuit of the facts verses church tradtions.

James
I really like it
Chuck Missler has done it again. He has given us a well researched text and presented it in an easy to read context. I enjoyed this book and learned a substantial amount.
Chuck lays it out and get you excited to dig into the Bible!!
This is a fascinating series of explanations to origins of customs and how they tie back to Christmas. This is so interesting and eye opening I have started using it for a small group bible study.

Almost 95% of this is found in his book: Learn the Bible in 24 hours. That is a more complete book, and the synopses said it would mention many prominent Christmas traditions, yet it left out Santa Claus. Get his best work and save your money.

The Christmas season allows a more deeper understanding.  This book has lessons of truth that can be gained.  Thanks to the author for putting this prized knowledge out there in such an organized way.
I will be sharing this book.
If you are familiar with chuck misslers style then you will feel right at home with this book. It takes a deeper look at the time JESUS wa born.
Great historical information from credible researchers. Puts a lot of questions to rest & reveals some incredible details that are amazing

Chuck missler has done extensive research before writing this boom and it is evident in this one as well as in his other works. A very good read and I will recommend to all my friends. Big thanks to Mr. Missler for giving me new insight to the Christmas story!

This is the factual account of the events leading to the birth of our Saviour.  It is not colored by pagan tradition, nor by the popular views of the modern era.  This book brings to life the events sorrounding the angel Gabriel's visit to Mary, his promise to her concerning the child she bore and His part in the history of our world and eternity,  The gifts of the magi, their mission, and the results of their visit and the tragic events after Herod realized that the Magi were there to honor the King, not a political appointee.
This small book is packed with so much  information. You will want to begin studying immediately  I loved it.  Have fun
Another great one from Chuck! If your life has every been blessed by a chuck missler lesson and you want to share his insight with others this Chirstmas season this is a great one to share.
Good book
I never this side of the story, a lot of historical information.

Dr. Missler is a bible scholar and so very knowledgeable in God's word..He is the the foremost the best I have ever encountered along with Thomas Horn. I read anything they both publish...Very good read..Thanks..keep it going .
Great little book packed full of information. This book makes you really look hard at what we have always assumed to be correct about the Christmas Story.
Most Christians do not wish to go beyond anything that changes their beliefs, it's sad because the church does not encourage it's members investigate beyond the milk of the Word.
We had seen it on TV and wanted a copy to share with family and friends.
Very informative
This book is amazing at explaining the details hidden in Scripture that legitimize and prove that Jesus Christ is the Messiah!
Couldn't put it down just wowed by this mans intellect Thank you sir for opening a door in my thought life. Thank you
Thank you for this book. One can understand everything much better. And I really want to learn as much as I can. Be blessed
Excellent
